Package com.ikalagaming.entity.powers

Relate to powers that an entity may use.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICaster
    An interface that is supposed to be used to determine what can use a power.
    ICost
    An interface that is supposed to be used to determine what a power costs to use.
    Power
    A minimum representation of a power that can be owned by or applied to an entity.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CostList
    A list of CostPairs and some helper methods for determining info about the list.
    CostPair
    A resource, and how much of that resource, that is needed to use a power.
    PowerDatabase  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Element
    An element describes the type of damage or resistance a given power may have.
    Target
    What a power allows the user to target.

Package com.ikalagaming.entity.powers Description

Relate to powers that an entity may use.
